name: map-magic
description: Map Magic is a web application designed for creating and customizing interactive maps. It allows users to select counties/states, apply colors, and export maps as images or JSON data. Built with Node.js, Express, and Vue.js, Map Magic is optimized for performance and ease of use, with a focus on detailed map customization and data integration.

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.start:prod: NODE_ENV=production npm run build && NODE_ENV=production npm start
